modName: HighRes 4K CBBE Nude Female Re-Texture Mod
summary: The high resolution (4096) of CBBE (Calientes V3) nude human female with 8 pubic hairstyles.[Realistic & Smooth Skins] Supports NMM with Installer and image previews.
descriptionHtml:

If you have any comment, please let me know @ Khajitsree@hotmail.com or this website.

- Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente (Skin meshe)

================ How to install? 

Manual Install: 

Open the \"Packs\" folder. Inside, you will find the \"Skin\" folders. Two \"Skin\" folder contains important fire that you need to install first (Please choose only one skin). You will see a Data folder. Extract this folder into your Skyrim folder and you will have the new skin texture for Human female.

If you need custom pubic hair, please open the \"Packs\" folder. Inside, you will find the \"Pubic\" folder. Then, you opened \"Pubic\" folder, you will see skin type folders (Please use same main type skin) and open you pubic style folder as your like. You will see a Data folder. Extract this folder into your Skyrim folder and you will have the new skin texture for Human female with you new pubic hair style.

================ Mod Detail

- Realistic Skin (Freckles, Mole, Pore, Hair stump and Capillary) <Modified from 4uDIK\'s mod>

================ Change Log

================ Sponsor

Khajitsree
